anime.name: Soul Eater
anime.info: Set in the Shinigami technical school for weapon meisters, the series revolves around 3 groups of each a weapon meister and a human weapon. Trying to make the latter a "Death Scythe" and thus fit for use by the Shinigami, they must collect the souls of 99 evil humans and 1 witch.
#4: "Ai ga Hoshii Yo" by Shion Tsuji
#5: "Ao no Kaori" (碧の香り) by Yui Makino
Manga UK's Official Soul Eater Sales Site
Madman's Official Soul Eater Sales Site
SOUL EATER - ソウルイーター -

episode.title: Resonance of the Soul ～ Soul = Eater, Becoming a Death Scythe？～

Becoming the Perfect Boy? Death･The･Kid's Magnificent Mission?~

Demon Blade Masamune〜Torn Dependant Soul, Singing Heart's Rain?〜
Tsubaki, the Camellia: What lies beyond Sadness?
Courage that is not Lost to Fear〜Maka=Albarn's One Large Determination?〜

Battle of the gods 〜Death City's crisis of destruction?〜

Sword Saint Rises: A Sweet or a Salty Taste?

Cut the Cards: Medusa Surrenders to Shibusen?
